# HOC LITERATURE INDEX

**Generated by:** `scripts/ops/hoc_literature_generator.py`  
**Reference:** HOC_LAYER_TOPOLOGY_V2.0.0.md (RATIFIED)

## ⚠️ Health Score Disclaimer

> **Health scores measure CONFORMANCE TO TOPOLOGY RULES ONLY.**
>
> They do NOT indicate:
> - Feature completeness
> - Production readiness
> - Code quality
> - Test coverage
>
> A domain with 100% conformance may still be missing features.
> A domain with 40% conformance may work perfectly in production.
> These scores guide restructuring priority, nothing more.
